trustfund:
TF033060-TUNISIA - ECONOMIC
            COMPETITIVENESS ADJUST. LOAN,TF032652-MENA REGION - CIVIL SERVICE REFORM,TF023032-PHRD-PRIVATE INDUSTRY COMPETITIVENESS

abstracts.cdata!:
The Economic Competitiveness Adjustment
            Loan for Tunisia will provide financial support for the
            Government's program aimed at improving international
            competitiveness and accelerating its integration in world
            markets. The principle benefits derived from this reform
            program's implementation will be: a) an increase in
            allocation efficiency and private sector productivity; b)
            world market integration; and c) balance of payments
            strengthened and access to private capital markets
            consolidated. The specific policy measures concern the
            following areas: a) a sound macroeconomic and fiscal
            framework; b) the acceleration of the Free Trade Agreement
            implementation; c) the acceleration of the competitive
            sectors privatization program; d) the improvement of the
            regulatory and administrative environment; and e) a greater
            labor market flexibility. The loan will be a standard
            adjustment loan of two tranches, with the second tranche
            release conditional on meeting the key conditions listed in
            the Loan Agreement.
